sect3.title: Program Files
sect3.para: ex (link to vim), rview (link to vim), rvim (link to vim), vi (link to vim), view (link to vim), vim, vimdiff (link to vim), vimtutor (link to vim) and xxd

sect4.title: ex
sect4.para: ex starts vim in Ex mode.

sect4.title: rview
sect4.para: rview is a restricted version of view. No shell commands can be started and Vim can't be suspended.

sect4.title: rvim
sect4.para: rvim is the restricted version of vim. No shell commands can be started and Vim can't be suspended.

sect4.title: vi
sect4.para: vi starst vim in vi-compatible mode.

sect4.title: view
sect4.para: view starts vim in read-only mode.

sect4.title: vim
sect4.para: vim starts vim in the normal, default way.

sect4.title: vimdiff
sect4.para: vimdiff edits two or three versions of a file with Vim and show differences.

sect4.title: xxd
sect4.para: xxd makes a hexdump or does the reverse.
